subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Dorin Dickerson, one of the top offensive talents out of a Pennsylvania high school over the last decade, has made a surprise switch to linebacker and is expected to start this season as a sophomore.
snippet: Dorin Dickerson, one of the top offensive talents out of a Pennsylvania high school over the last decade, has made a surprise switch to linebacker and is expected to start this season as a sophomore.
